title: PM links political, economic challenges to failed policies of PTIâ€™s govt
content:
ISLAMABAD, March 26 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Sunday said that current political, governance and economic challenges had their roots in the failed policies of the previous government of Imran Niazi.
On his Twitter handle, the prime minister said that Imran Niazi had always been about grandstanding and rhetoric.
He further posted that the nation was justified in asking him (Imran) about his dismal performance in office both at the federal and provincial levels.
